values:
Hey Kurtis, Im awake its 2:09 i wanna call u but i dont wanna bug u. I hope u had a good time with your new life (ppl) at the mall and movies and stuff. I did nothing really. But umm well just incase  your wondering how im doing here u go (nothing bad ).
I can't meet 
I can not help im Losing sleep over this No I can't And now I cannot stop pacing Give me a few hours I'll have this all sorted out... If my mind would just stop racing Cause I cannot stand still I cant be this unsturdy This cannot be happening This is over my head But underneath my feet Cause by tomoroow morning I'll have this thing beat And everything will be back to the way that it was I wish that it was just that easy Cause I'm waiting for tonight Been waiting for tomoroow I'm somewhere in between What i thought was real was just a dream Would you catch me if I fall, out of what I fell in? Dont be surprised if I collapse down at your feet again !I don't want to run away from this.I know that I just don't need this Cause I cannot stand still I cant be this unsturdy 
This cannot be happening (I thought what we had meant something)
Cause I'm waiting for tonight 
Been waiting for tomorrow 
And I'm somewhere in between .....

 
I wish u could find me here and speak to me I want to feel you again like i use 2, I need to hear you so i know that i am ok. Kurtis u were the light that lead me to the place where i found peace.You are the strength that keeps me walking. You were the hope that kept me trusting....You are the life to my soul.You are my purpose, Kurtis u are everything to me.... And how can i stand here with you and not be moved by you? Would u tell me how could it be any better than this?!?!? You calmed the storms you gave me rest,U held me in your hands, i wish you wouldnt let me fall.You still my heart and take my breath away.Would u ever take me in again would you take it deeper than u ever had before? Because your all i want, your all i need, you are everything .

Kurtis, I cant sit here and act like i dont care for you anymore. I dont know what the hell is wrong with me? I dont know what to do. You would think id hate you for cheating on me with 3 diffrent girls and fucking one of the 3. But im not, Its weird i cant be mad at you for somereason no matter how hard i try( but i do know it hurts really bad inside and ive got 10million diffrent thoughts going on in my head). I cant take this feeling anymore its way out of touch, what the hell is the meaning to this? It means way to much.I dont know why i cant get over the fact that u dont care about me anymore. Its just theres this thing going on in my head telling me to hold on and not to let go of u. But ive got to you wanna move on obviously. But i wish you werent. You know my summer sucked ass. I spent the whole summer thinking of you and wonderind what u were  doing and hoping and praying every night that everything in my life will somehow  fall into place.I wanted u back (i didnt get it) i wanted to be with you ( i didnt get the chance) I wanted to be your girl again (only in my dreams).I cant get over you Kurtis, THIS SCARES ME! Kurt you know im not thee kinda person to bring myslef down, or smoke or drink everytime i have the chance to. U KNOW THAT. Kurtis ahhhh god I hate myslef right now, I wanna die just so i can be happy (so you can be happy) I wont be the girl u call a crazy bitch who needs to get over it.I will be out of your life i wont ever have to bug you again. I know you hate it... But Kurt this is the only way i can ever talk to you, u wont ever come see us anymore. I never knew someone could change soo damn much. But i guess now i know it can happen?!? " Gosh i really hope you are reading all of this". Its 3 in the morning. I just wish i could be the girl u wanted "oh god what i would do to be in that girls spot". "there is snot and tears all over my keyboard lol".... Kurtis i dont know if im ever gonna get you back again.That scares me... I dont think ive EVER EVER Felt this way about anyone. Kurt I dont like you for your looks. I like you for you. For who you REALLY ARE. I liked everything about you i loved your smile your laugh your goofy comments just to make me smile/laugh, the way you would hold me, lol the way you walk "its so cute" . I could go on 4-ever.Kurtis i would really LOVE it if you would reply back to this, Im being serious if you dont than i guess............... U dont need to know.I just need to know you got this if you havnt replyd by sunday then i know you havnt read this and i guess i have to send it again. I really hope youve read this whole email. I made the FONT size bigger for you so you can see it. HEHE. Kurtis Im sorry for whatever i did to make you do this to me. But I also hope u know that i hurt i hurt bad, I wish i could just be a bird and fly away from my problems.I hope you know now i REALLY didnt mean to call u a FUCKUP................................................................
Im gonna go for a walk, and then go to sleep.

Love 
Bridgett   
 LeAnn   
  Ivey 


I wish i couldve had the chance to tell u all this in perrson. I was going to but u never really gave me the chance, Besides it wouldve been to dramatic i wouldnt want you to see me like this.

Ok u guys would u reply back to that if someone sent that to you...?? WEll im hoping it will finally get his attention. Oh just to fill u guys in Kurtis cheated on me with 3 other girls while going out with me and fucked one of the 3.... WOW I know rite. Well ppl im gonna go who wants to hear from a FUCK UP like me.

Omg Jason Bell. HEHEHEHE he is like the coolest guy ever .None of my friends now him but amanda he is in high school 17 years old. And he is soo funny and a great guy to talk to. He is a Firefighter sexi huh.Yea but he is really sweet. We dont go out but we do have a date comming up soon :) i cant wait.

Hit the Floor 02:44
There are just too many
Times that people
Have tried to look inside of me
Wondering what I think of you
And I protect you out of courtesy
Too many times that I've
Held on when I needed to push away
Afraid to say what was on my mind
Afraid to say what I need to say
Too many
Things that you've said about me
When I'm not around
You think having the upper hand
Means you've got to keep putting me down
But I've had too many stand-offs with you
It's just about as much as I can stand
Just wait until the upper hand
Is mine

So many people like me
Put so much trust in all your lies
So concerned with what you think
To just say what we feel inside
So many people like me
Walk on eggshells all day long
All I know is that all I want
Is to feel like I'm not stepped on
There are so many things you say
That make me feel like you've crossed the line
What goes up will surely fall
And I'm counting down the time
'Cause I've had so many stand-offs with you
It's about as much as I can stand
So I'm waiting until the upper hand
Is mine

One minute you're on top
The next you're not
Watch it drop
Making your heart stop
Just before you hit the floor
One minute you're on top
The next you're not
Missed your shot
Making your heart stop
You think you won.

And then it's all gone

I know I'll never trust a single thing you say
You knew your lies would divide us
But you lied anyway
And all the lies have got you floating
Up above us all
But what goes up has got to fall

This is the song i emaild to kurtis! I also added a lil something

Ps- Kurtis this is the side of me you dont wanna mess with but youve crossed that line. I told him he was a fuck up kinda mean but it is kinda fucked up how he lies and thinks no ones going to figure it out. I also said im going to be talking to katie im gonna see if he has lied to her too. and let her know whta hes been telling me.I feel pretty mean. But when ppl lie to you more than one dont you give them their lil payback? I think so.....But i think alot of things. Amanda is setting me up with Josh yates ive had the biggest crush on him since the 6th grade, and she is going to try me with Aaron :) he is soo funny. But yea i told Kurtis i would wait for him but if i meet ppl I feel like i have a good connection with uh im not waiting. I mean he didnt he goes out with someone so he should stay with her while HE CAN.

Omfg, My ex boyfriend Kurtis told me he wanted a break for about 2 or 4 months.. SO i said ok , well i didnt think he was gonna go out with another chick?!?! Somone I dont even know said hey your ex boyfriend goes out with a girl name katie and she says his last girl friend was cat!!!! I feelBetrayed and crushed i dont think i ever wanna talk to  him again! He played me! I know taking a break mean u do whatever but not the way he put it u know! Im heart broken and he prob cheated on me with some girl name cat!!!!!! Im sooo stupid. Why did i fall for him!!

I just wanna see what the hell the horny mouse looks like LMAO.

LMAO my dog just ran into the door 3 times in a row ROTFL.!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Wow I woke up at 7:24 this morning??? I dont know why its like 10:17 now. Ive been cleaning thoe casue ive been really bored. I think im going to lye down at like 11 and sleep till about 1 or 2 ZzzZzz. I went to bed last night at like 3, i couldnt go to sleep, I was off the computer when i called kurts cell to listen to his voicemail ( lol he sounded like a lil kid it was SOOO cute)that was about 11 somethin then i just didnt feel like getting back on. I really cant wait for school to start! I just miss everyone so much. Oh Johnathon is having a HUGE party when his parents are out of town I CANT WAIT!!!!!!! Im tierd!! Timothy Finally called me last night at like 5:00 telling me that he gives up and he doesnt care about me any more! THANK GOD HE ACUALLY GOT THE PICTURE!! I mean Timothy is cool but ugh i just hate him sometimes he is so damn winy and anyoing, and WAY to controlive. Im glad he got the picture that i wanted him somewhat out of my life! Im going to my daddies on friday he is going to be hear to pick me up around noon :) YAY!!!! I might stay a week if i cant bring charlie ( my dog) , if i can bring charlie i might stay 2 weeks. But Ashley is comming back on the 24th so i might come home that weekne she gets back. She wants me to go school shopping with her so were gonna do that. LoL were going to have so much fun this year at school. Those 8th grade teachers are ALL BITCHES but they dont know what kinda kids there up against this year :) hahaha.
http://twinkiemepink.livejournal.com/1906.html

Im not really doing anything.. Im just thinking about kurtis, as usual.... But katherine Sosa and i are talkin again, its been a long time. We are talkin bout seein eachother soon maybe when i get back from my dads? But she wants me to go to a party with her ( wich i cant wait) becasuse Kat is one of those crazy girls like me so we would have a blast. But see we have to sneek out... And her paretns dont pay much attention. So we are gonna stay at her house and have Elliot pick us up. I cant wait!!! Man i love kurtis. lol dont we all know that?!?! There was this one guy on sayin how much Linkin Park sucked... I flipped out and was like they soo do not then he started callin me a bitch and a hoe and shit out of no wear. That really pissed me off!! But i couldnt say anything i was just shocked. My lesson of the day is never mess with a boi and his rock bands.....
http://twinkiemepink.livejournal.com/1731.html

For some odd reason i feel empty insied, just all of a sudden?! Im going to my dads Thursaday or Friday? I really hope i see Kurtis before i leave.Ive not talked to him so far today!? I guess he is bussy... I really cant wait till he is done doing whatever he is doing for me with my song... I hope it doesnt make me cry.? Why is it all of a suddne you feel so bad isint it weird. U just feel like dying. I think my cousin Amanda understands. I hate that.I wached the Butterfly Affect the other day and that movie is awesome!!!!! How many ppl would do that just to make their friends happy. And  secret window kinda scared me who in the hell is that absessed with corn... I know im not? And Euro Trip Coop reminds me of Kurt (lol) no lie. And the perfecet score well it was ok.. I wanna make out on a roof top too. Wouldnt that be great.. "just a lil too GREAT". Well thats what been on my mind so far..
http://twinkiemepink.livejournal.com/1534.html

Im wide awake!! And i really miss Erica you know you never now how much your going to miss something until its gone... I miss goin to see her and tellin her my problems, i really needed her when kurtis broke up with me!!! And when i cut my hair, on the way home for some reason i told my mom to go by Ericas house so ican show her my new hair cut,. Then i stoped and ealized she didnt live down the road anymore, i started to ball. Its funny i miss Erica and i need kurtis. When i was with Kurtis he always i mean always put a smile on my face. And every time he would just smile at me for no reason i just felt so good because i knew he was thinking about me for atleast a split second.I just wish he would quit saying he was a fuck up becasue he really isint. I dont know what i would do without him. Me and amanda are crazy we are in love with 2 amazing guys, we both went out with them  and now were not with them anymore.But for some reason me and amanda just feel like there is still a litle hope. But even if there werent any hope we wont ever give up on them.I just wish they could see how much we love them and how much we would do for them, why cant guys see that. Is it that hard to stop and realize how much someone loves you?? I mean sometimes it makes me feel like im not good enough for them, like im to ugly or you know. I wish guys could express there feelings like us girls can. But i guess thats the  way it goes. Well thats whats been goin on in my head!!!!!!!!!!!!!

My boyfriend Kurtis dumped me over the net on thursday! He said it wasn't me it was him but we all know how guys are. And now i got Timothy Mark and Dustin up my ass 24/7. I hate that!!! All i really want is kurtis.. But i guess everything happens for a reason? AS Britts cousin told me love starts with a hug grows with a kiss and ends with a tear. Love hurts and well that sux ass!!! But maybe (like he said) when he gets done thinking he will know what to do. ANdi hope thats soon.
